name: ducks DUCK!
description:
Save your life and your ducklings' in this deadly ROOM full of DISCS.

Beat all challenges or compete with yourself or your friends for the top score.

Tips:

  • Move with WASD or ↑ ←↓→, duck with Spacebar.
  • If you stand when you're in the middle of a disc you can break it, but be careful with your neck!
  • Kinder mode is a bit more lenient with you, so try it out if you get frustrated.
  • Ducks can duck.

Made for #discroomgamejam by Laura Calle & Alberto Rico.

Music: Firestarter by Jeremy Black

Using sounds from freesound:

  • Swoosh.wav by Brsjak
  • Chewing, Carrot, A.wav by InspectorJ 
  • party horn 3/3 harsh by vewiu
  • Tischbombe_2.wav by Thomas Bruderer
